subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Speeches and Statements
Homosexuality
Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
Discrimination
lead_paragraph: As the Olympics began, Thomas Bach, president of the International Olympic Committee, made some telling points that sounded like sharp digs at Russia’s president.
snippet: As the Olympics began, Thomas Bach, president of the International Olympic Committee, made some telling points that sounded like sharp digs at Russia’s president.
